LanguageData.HelpTextAddOn:
Additional CleanUp..
Animal Family tail-in:Sometimes there are too many members(dead or of other factions) in an animal family,and this function can remove them.Better use after cleaning World Pawns.
Remove Filth in HomeArea: **Too powerful, only displayed under dev mode**
Remove Corpses in current map: **Too powerful, only displayed under dev mode** All the dead pawns in graves or anything like that will be ignored.
Remove BattleLog Entries: Yes, literally.
LanguageData.HelpTextFix:
Fix..
Faction Relationships:It could fix the DebugLog Error:"Faction xxx has null relation with xxx. Return Dummy relation." This tool could not fix the Error caused by the following mods: 1.Misc. FactionBase:Error while generating maps,if a mechanoid is spawned. 2.PPSMedicalCare (not for sure):Error during saving and loading,and that might become increasingly serious.
Faction Leaders:Generates leaders for factions so that you can use the Comms console again. A faction leader won't be replaced if a faction currently has one.
LanguageData.HelpTextSysGC:
Reclaim Memory
System.GC.Collect(),so memory(used by GameSystem) will be reclaimed.
Minor boost for game performance (and it returns to normal soon).
